power: 40W maximum power with shutter open and cooling maximum. Power supplied by AC/DC "brick" supply with international AC input plug. Alternate 12V input for user's source.
mounting: 5.125" bolt circle. Optional Nikon or Canon lens mount.
cameraheadsize: D7. Aluminum, hard black anodized. 7" x 7" x 2.55" (17.8 x 17.8 x 6.48 cm). Weight
